title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Social Studies Practical Competencies Using Web-Based Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can apply key social studies concepts (citizenship, cultural diversity, economic principles) to real classroom scenarios through VR simulations.
Learners can complete the social studies lesson plan design process by collaborating with peer teachers using web-based collaborative tools.
Learners can diagnose their instructional design competencies and establish improvement plans based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
